title: Groq crashing when it should retry
body:
> Its not a billing issue it is crashing
> 
> ```node:internal/process/promises:288
>             triggerUncaughtException(err, true /* fromPromise */);
>             ^
> 
> RetryError [AI_RetryError]: Failed after 3 attempts. Last error: Rate limit reached for model `llama-3.1-8b-instant` in organization `org_01j5b4pz9jff492fq686vypsx6` service tier `on_demand` on tokens per minute (TPM): Limit 6000, Used 3770, Requested 2374. Please try a\
> gain in 1.430999999s. Need more tokens? Upgrade to Dev Tier today at https://console.groq.com/settings/billing
>     at _retryWithExponentialBackoff (file:///mnt/data1/nix/time/2025/03/14/cloud-deployment-eliza/node_modules/ai/dist/index.mjs:283:13)
>     at process.processTicksAndRejections (node:internal/process/task_queues:95:5)
>     at async fn (file:///mnt/data1/nix/time/2025/03/14/cloud-deployment-eliza/node_modules/ai/dist/index.mjs:4106:32)
>     at async file:///mnt/data1/nix/time/2025/03/14/cloud-deployment-eliza/node_modules/ai/dist/index.mjs:470:22
>     at async TEXT_SMALL (file:///mnt/data1/nix/time/2025/03/14/cloud-deployment-eliza/packages/plugin-groq/dist/index.js:95:40)
>     at async AgentRuntime.useModel (file:///mnt/data1/nix/time/2025/03/14/cloud-deployment-eliza/packages/cli/dist/chunk-RSA7S755.js:27926:22)
>     at async file:///mnt/data1/nix/time/2025/03/14/cloud-deployment-eliza/packages/cli/dist/chunk-RSA7S755.js:26492:29
>     at async messageReceivedHandler (file:///mnt/data1/nix/time/2025/03/14/cloud-deployment-eliza/packages/cli/dist/chunk-RSA7S755.js:26561:5)
>     at async events (file:///mnt/data1/nix/time/2025/03/14/cloud-deployment-eliza/packages/cli/dist/chunk-RSA7S755.js:26745:7)
>     at async Promise.all (index 0) {
>   cause: undefined,
>   reason: 'maxRetriesExceeded',
>   errors: [
>     APICallError [AI_APICallError]: Rate limit reached for model `llama-3.1-8b-instant` in organization `org_01j5b4pz9jff492fq686vypsx6` service tier `on_demand` on tokens per minute (TPM): Limit 6000, Used 4380, Requested 2374. Please try again in 7.537s. Need more tok\
> ens? Upgrade to Dev Tier today at https://console.groq.com/settings/billing
> ``` 

 _Originally posted by @jmikedupont2 in [#4040](https://github.com/elizaOS/eliza/issues/4040#issuecomment-2755697456)_

title: Twitter: Authorization: Status is a duplicate.

comments.author: jmikedupont2
comments.body:
When i restart after changing the name of the agent 

```2025-03-26 19:42:47] ERROR: Failed to ensure connection: User 3694f252-b1e1-0268-8d1a-361a5015872b not found
    agentName: "METZGER"
    agentId: "3694f252-b1e1-0268-8d1a-361a5015872b"
[2025-03-26 19:42:47] ERROR: Failed to create Twitter client for 3694f252-b1e1-0268-8d1a-361a5015872b:
    message: "(Error) User 3694f252-b1e1-0268-8d1a-361a5015872b not found"
    stack: [
      "Error: User 3694f252-b1e1-0268-8d1a-361a5015872b not found",
      "at AgentRuntime.ensureParticipantInRoom (file:///mnt/data1/nix/time/2025/03/14/cloud-deployment-eliza/packages/cli/dist/chunk-RSA7S755.js:27706:13)",
      "at process.processTicksAndRejections (node:internal/process/task_queues:95:5)",
      "at async AgentRuntime.ensureConnection (file:///mnt/data1/nix/time/2025/03/14/cloud-deployment-eliza/packages/cli/dist/chunk-RSA7S755.js:27685:7)",
      "at async _ClientBase.populateTimeline (file:///mnt/data1/nix/time/2025/03/14/cloud-deployment-eliza/packages/plugin-twitter/dist/index.js:7702:7)",
      "at async _ClientBase.init (file:///mnt/data1/nix/time/2025/03/14/cloud-deployment-eliza/packages/plugin-twitter/dist/index.js:7529:5)",
      "at async _TwitterService.createClient (file:///mnt/data1/nix/time/2025/03/14/cloud-deployment-eliza/packages/plugin-twitter/dist/index.js:9042:7)",
      "at async _TwitterService.start (file:///mnt/data1/nix/time/2025/03/14/cloud-deployment-eliza/packages/plugin-twitter/dist/index.js:9169:9)",
      "at async AgentRuntime.registerService (file:///mnt/data1/nix/time/2025/03/14/cloud-deployment-eliza/packages/cli/dist/chunk-RSA7S755.js:27880:29)",
      "at async Promise.all (index 0)",
      "at async AgentRuntime.registerPlugin (file:///mnt/data1/nix/time/2025/03/14/cloud-deployment-eliza/packages/cli/dist/chunk-RSA7S755.js:27144:7)"
    ]
```
